FuncDef:
The mpls mldp p2mp disable command disables the mLDP P2MP capability on a specific interface.
The undo mpls mldp p2mp disable command restores the default mLDP P2MP capability.
By default, the mLDP P2MP capability on a specific interface of a node is the same as that configured globally on the node.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
mLDP P2MP can be disabled on a specific interface when an mLDP P2MP LSP is not expected to pass through the interface. To disable mLDP P2MP on a specific interface, run the mpls mldp p2mp disable command.
Prerequisites
MPLS LDP has been enabled globally using the mpls ldp command.
